briefTitle: Phase III Study of the Correlation Between Florbetapir F18 PET Imaging and Amyloid Pathology in the Brain
officialTitle: A Phase III Study of the Correlation Between Florbetapir F 18 (18F-AV-45) PET Imaging and Amyloid Pathology
summary: The study is designed to test the relationship between measurements of brain amyloid using florbetapir F 18 PET imaging and true levels of amyloid by dissection of the brain at autopsy. Amyloid in the brain is a key feature of Alzheimer's Disease (AD).

primaryOutcome.measure: Correlation of Florbetapir-PET Image and Amyloid Plaque Density
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: at autopsy up to 12 months post-scan
